DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , single blind control trial investigate effect epidural load high volume , low concentration local anesthetic solution via epidural needle versus epidural catheter .
DOC.brief_title: Epidural Loading : High Volume , Low Concentration
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , single blind control trial investigate effect epidural load high volume , low concentration local anesthetic solution via epidural needle versus epidural catheter . Control patient receive local anesthetic low volume concentrate solution via epidural catheter current standard practice . Outcome measure include quantify pain relief respect time use VAS score . In addition , post delivery patient satisfaction regard anesthesia regimen , blood pressure change , heart rate , anesthetic level , total dose epidural use labor , rescue dos incidence fetal bradycardia assess . 35 patient recruit three arm study , total 105 patient , order obtain significance perform statistical analysis follow complete enrollment study . The impetus study involve investigation effect load epidural space high volume , low concentration local anesthetic via two different modality study method efficacious .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects volunteer consented participation study upon admission labor delivery 2 . Parturients active labor request epidural analgesia 3 . Uncomplicated pregnancy reassure fetal heart trace 4 . Age great equal 18 year 1 . Contraindication epidural anesthesia 2 . Inability read , comprehend , sign inform consent form 3 . Fetal intrauterine growth retardation ( IUGR ) 4 . Nonreassuring fetal heart trace 5 . Cervical dilation great 7cm 6 . Intrauterine fetal demise 7 . History chronic pain back 8 .
